name: cursor-with
description: A tiny, customizable, easy-to-use, framework-Agnostic, and high performance cursor following effect.
author: voidis <lbh_ldu@outlook.com>

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter cursorwith-ts dev & pnpm --filter cursorwith-test dev
scripts.prod: pnpm --filter cursorwith-test prod & pnpm --filter cursorwith-test prod
scripts.release:prepare:patch: npm version patch -C packages/cursor-with --no-git-tag-version && pnpm changelog:update
scripts.release:prepare:minor: npm version minor -C packages/cursor-with --no-git-tag-version && pnpm changelog:update
scripts.release:prepare:major: npm version major -C packages/cursor-with --no-git-tag-version && pnpm changelog:update
scripts.release:prepare:prerelease:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid alpha -C packages/cursor-with --no-git-tag-version && pnpm changelog:update
